value.title: Power BI Goals - Create Scorecard and Manual Goals in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to the Power BI Goals Step by Step Beginner tutorial series, During this session, we will talk about how to create Scorecard and Manual Goals in Power BI. To get started with Goals we need to create a Scorecard in Power BI. Once ou scorecard is created, we can add the Goals within the same scorecard.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/88-JKP7-3PY" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Tip - Hide Filter Pane From the Published Version of Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can hide the Filter Pane from the published version of the Power BI report. Sometimes there are situations in which we have set our Visual, Page or Report level filter as a part of development logic and we wish that end user should not able to change those values.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SNU-6EM43Ao" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Quickly create Power BI reports in Power BI Service
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session to demonstrate the new feature which is just been rolled out by Microsoft. Now, we can quickly create reports using the Power BI Service itself. We don’t need to open the Power BI Desktop for the same. This new feature is being rolled out from December 2020 Power BI

value.title: Reminder - Install WebView2 to Get Latest Updates from Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: This video, is the reminder for the updating your system with WebView2 if you want to receive, Power BI Desktop updates from February 2022. Microsoft is making the switch to better optimize our development and release process . It also means that you’ll automatically get the latest security patches as

value.title: Remove or Unpublish “Publish to Web” Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this video, we will talk the procedure of removing a Power BI report after it has been publishing to web and anonymously accessed on web. value.title: Sort a table using Multiple Columns in Power BI | Multi Column Sort in Power  BI
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, how we can sort a tale using multiple columns for the table visualization in Power BI. value.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily
value.excerpt: Sometimes you need Power BI support. Even if you know a lot about Power BI, everyone has a brain fart from time to time. Adam looks at 5 different ways you can get Power BI support to get you past your hurdle.  Community Site: https://community.powerbi.com Twitter Hashtag: #PowerBI and #pbihelp Facebook
